markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Singularity Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1307)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 43</row>

**Price** 550 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Singularity ammunition_ seems to pull in the light around it, swirling along the surface in a misty pattern. An activated _singularity arrow_ creates a strong gravitational force, centered on the creature hit. All creatures in a 10-foot emanation from the target must succeed at a DC 30 Fortitude save or be [pulled](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) 5 feet closer to the target. The singularity then explodes, dealing 7d12 bludgeoning damage to the original target and all creatures in a 5-foot emanation (DC 28 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Singularity Ammunition
